name: Not Your Average Dice Roller
description:
Not Your Average Dice Roller

A first person shooter in which the player's objective is to survive and reach the door in each level. 

Controls

WASD to move.

Left mouse to shoot.

1 and 2 to use abilities.

Q to equip a random weapon.

E to equip random abilities.

Notes

When playing the game, you might notice that there are no dice present in the game, despite that being the theme of the jam. This is the case because we ultimately ran out of time to implement dice mechanics.  The original idea had been to have a pair of dice roll whenever the player enters a new level, and their outcome would have been used to determine the player's weapon and skills, but unfortunately there wasn't enough time in the end to add this feature.
